title: The Triangle Shirtwaist Fire
itunes:title: The Triangle Shirtwaist Fire
description:
Robert is joined by Propaganda to discuss the Triangle Shirtwaist Fire


Footnotes:

  1. https://www.osha.gov/aboutosha/40-years/trianglefactoryfireaccount
  2. https://www.smithsonianmag.com/history/uncovering-the-history-of-the-triangle-shirtwaist-fire-124701842/

  4. https://www.famous-trials.com/trianglefire/971-trianglecodes
  5. http://projects.leadr.msu.edu/makingmodernus/exhibits/show/the-triangle-shirtwaist-factor/the-fire 
  6. https://www.assp.org/news-and-articles/2021/03/24/the-triangle-shirtwaist-factory-fire-an-american-tragedy 
  7. https://www.history.com/topics/early-20th-century-us/triangle-shirtwaist-fire 
  8. https://www.pbs.org/wgbh/americanexperience/features/shirtwaist-kings/

  10. https://www.forbes.com/sites/amyfeldman/2019/11/22/why-the-triangle-shirtwaist-factory-fire-still-burns-hot-today/?sh=34310fb3704a
  11. https://www.loc.gov/classroom-materials/immigration/italian/the-great-arrival/
  12. https://www.jstor.org/stable/1396423?seq=1
